detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#22-25) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#23)

DKING (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#250-326) has the function that can only return the default value
	Default value functions:
	- DKING.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#264-275)
	- DKING.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#277-301)
detectors.markdown:
[DKING](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L250-L326) has the function that can only return the default value
	Default value functions:
	- [DKING.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L264-L275)
	- [DKING.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L277-L301)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in DKING.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#264-275):
	External calls:
	- tokenRecipient(stakingAddress).receiveApproval(msg.sender,_amountToDisburse,) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#272)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- require(bool,string)(super.transfer(to,_amountAfterFee),Cannot transfer tokens.) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#274)
		- balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender].sub(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#107)
		- balances[_to] = balances[_to].add(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#108)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [DKING.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L264-L275):
	External calls:
	- [tokenRecipient(stakingAddress).receiveApproval(msg.sender,_amountToDisburse,)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L272)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [require(bool,string)(super.transfer(to,_amountAfterFee),Cannot transfer tokens.)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L274)
		- [balances[msg.sender] = balances[msg.sender].sub(_value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L107)
		- [balances[_to] = balances[_to].add(_value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#L108)

detectors.description:

	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#82)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DKING__1.sol#84)
